source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_00<tab>Hien is ready to undertake the challenge of Bardam's Mettle.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_00<tab>Хиен готов принять испытание в +++

source:
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_01<tab>If you are to participate in the Naadam and fight alongside the Mol, you must first be recognized as a warrior of the Steppe. To earn this honor, you will be required to complete a rite of passage involving walking in the footsteps of the legendary hero Bardam and taming a yol. Each member of your party must do this by themselves, of course, and so you shall...though if by pure coincidence some of your fellow adventurers happened to have made the long journey to the Far East, and simply <var 1A 02 /var>insisted<var 1A 01 /var> on accompanying you...surely no one would be any the wiser.

※Bardam's Mettle can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_02<tab>At the end of a strange and bewildering journey through Bardam's Mettle, you manage to tame a wild yol in the traditional fashion. Trial complete, you leave to rejoin your comrades.
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_03<tab>Lyse emerges from the pass not long after you do, her trial also complete. However, there is still no sign of Hien or Gosetsu...

TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_SEQ_04<tab>Suddenly recalling the whistles entrusted to her by Cirina, Lyse brings them forth, handing one to you. With a blow, you summon your respective yols, which circle in the skies above in acknowledgement of your new bond. There can be no doubt: you are now warriors of the Steppe.

target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_TODO_00<tab>Войдите в
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_TODO_01<tab>Войдите в
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_TODO_02<tab>Поговорите с Лиз.

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_000<tab><huff> <puff> This is it! The real trial!
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_000<tab>...Вот и оно. Настоящее испытание!

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_GOSETSU_000_005<tab>Tread softly. We are for hallowed ground, and the kami are restless...
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_GOSETSU_000_005<tab>Осторожнее. Мы на святой земле, ками глядят на нас...
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_010<tab>Ну что же, остаётся только начать.

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_011<tab>To complete the trial, we must each pass through Bardam's Mettle and tame a yol. How precisely we are to do this, I am not sure, but since countless warriors before us have succeeded, I imagine we'll muddle through somehow...
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_011<tab>Чтобы испытание считалось завершённым, нужно пройти сквозь +++ и приручить йола. Как именно это делается я понятия не имею, но раз уж тысячи молодых воинов и воительниц до нас справились, то и нам это должно быть по плечу...

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_012<tab>But enough talk! We have a Naadam to win!
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_012<tab>Всё, хватит болтовни! Нас ещё ждёт Наадам, помнишь?

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_020<tab>First the trial, then the Naadam, then Doma, then Ala Mhigo! We'll be back home before you know it!
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_020<tab>Итак, сперва испытание, потом Наадам, потом Дома, потом Ала Миго... Да я буду дома быстрее, чем они успеют заскучать!

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_025<tab>Quite frankly, if I cannot convince a large bird to follow me, then what hope do I have with the Xaela? Or my own countrymen, for that matter.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_HIEN_000_025<tab>Справедливости ради - если я не смогу уговорить большую птицу, то как я собираюсь повести за собой Зейла? Или мой собственный народ, если уж на то пошло.

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_GOSETSU_000_030<tab>I have stood upon more battlefields than I can count and lived to tell the tale. No bird will be my downfall!
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_GOSETSU_000_030<tab>Я бывал в сражениях больше раз, чем у меня пальцев на руках и ногах. А тут какие-то птицы...

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_040<tab>I should've known you'd be the first to make it through.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_040<tab>Я должна была догадаться, что ты станешь <var 08 E905 ((первой)) ((первым)) /var>, кто справится.

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_041<tab>I'm assuming you had no trouble? Good, good. I managed somehow, as you may have guessed.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_041<tab>Я так полагаю, проблем не возникло? Хорошо, хорошо. Я тоже как-то справилась, но ты об этом уже и <var 08 E905 ((сама догадалась)) ((сам догадался)) /var>.

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_042<tab>Looks like Hien and Gosetsu are still in there, though. Nothing for it but to wait, then.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_042<tab>Похоже, Хиен и Госэцу ещё там. Что ж, остаётся только ждать.

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_050<tab>Oh, right. I've still got those whistles Cirina gave me.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_050<tab>Ах, да. Те свистки, которые дала Цирина, до сих пор у меня.

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_051<tab>Here's yours. I suppose we ought to give them a try like she said.
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_051<tab>Вот твой. Так что, давай испытаем, как нас и просили?
TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_052<tab>Вон там, гляди!

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_053<tab>I think that means we've won them over. That one there is yours, right? The other one is mine. Awww...
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_053<tab>Думаю, это означает, что они наши. Вон та твоя, верно? А это... О-о-о...

source: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_054<tab>So that's that, then! We're officially warriors of the Steppe!
target: TEXT_STMBDA408_02507_LYSE_000_054<tab>Ну вот и оно! Теперь мы официально являемся воинами Степи!
